body:
@celanadalam
because if you weren't paying attention when the slime balls took control of the girls this time they permanently fuse to them wiping their memory effectively killing them in a indirect way, and just after the last chapter resolve in freeing them just to end the girls like that put a really shitty taste in everyone mouth
Finally the series end, it's a good read. But wtf happened in this comment section...
Yo what's up with the gender change tag???
It seems that the author is finally done with the series and rushed it, choosing an easy way out which is kind of a bummer.
Well, that took an incredibly dark turn. I’m kinda let down by the ending but overall this series is still a-okay.

Well this was disappointing. What started out as an interesting premise ended up being a snuff doujin with extra steps. Unless the author decides to do another chapter and pull some deus ex machina where its revealed that there is a way to remove the body snatching, but thats me being optimistic. 4 for the plot, 8 for the art.

I've seen some bad  rushed and even some well that happen endings, but to basically kill off all the girls he just save to leave them to a worse fate then what they had is very shitty.
the author better do the the mangaka of demon slayer did and make a true "good" ending where what happen on page 11 didn't happen at all or scrap this chapter all together erasing it from this story and have the last chapter be it's end.
or make it that the slimeballs in stead keep coming back regularly but now can purged from the body after they mate
bruh if nhentai had a forum this will be the best place for argument and invention
Good fap but kinda fucked up if you think about it

Counterargument すべて, firstly, this a a hentai website, not a place to kinkshame and call people sociopaths. But more importantly what most people complain about is that a relatively vanilla (by hentai standard, it still has mind control) series suddenly through in what basically amounts to snuff with extra steps, which is not something you can just throw in in the finally to a long running series without warning, since it's something most people really don't like.

people in here are complaining about this ending because they don't understand. you are reading an NTR doujin series about women being compelled by aliens stuck in their uteruses (uteri) to suck and fuck a highschool student with a huge cock and fat loads. you want a happy ending that makes everything seem peachy and hunky dory after all this fucked up (fictional) rape that gets you off so that you don't feel guilty about being sociopaths. you are sociopaths, you are controlled by your dicks, you don't deserve a happy ending, when you do bad things you end up alone. because this is fiction, it's good to write it in a way that is conducive to your fantasies, and so controls your libido and prevents you from committing hormonal evils in your real lives, while also acting as a cautionary in case it's even remotely possible that your brain could supersede your dick.
great job potato salad thanks for another banger.
Still one of my fav series and artist, but this ending sucked. Ehh my headcanon will be final chapter is 9. Wonder what artist is going to work on next.
I don't get it, but good fap
its like he shit himself right before finish line... wtf is this supposed to mean?
Way to ruin it.
wow, this chapter kinda ruined the whole series for me. art is still great though.
The author probably rushed it
Well this was a disappointing ending.
This is just sad. The girls are basically dead and the main character feels like he's all alone.

Unlike the others I wasnt able to understand what the fuck is happening, the series is good but if this is seriously the finale then it is one hell of a boring one, maybe I need To read it again or I just have a shitty attention span... Idk?

Although this is the best hentai series of possession. It would have been nice if none of the girls were possessed in the end, returning to somewhat normalcy. Cytroedu was not wrong about invalidating pretty much everything from before.
totally agree with Cytroedu

Well that was darker than necessary, and also a bad choice to wrap up everything. There girls already "kinda forced" loved him so that was a good plus, but erasing them again for popuni doesnt necessarily make it good it on contrary - it makes the hole situation bland at this point. Not only this chapter invalidates almost everything till now it was also a rather boring one since it got too many characters and no attractive conversation between characters . The difference between ch 9 to ch10... Still can't believe that I'm ranting about a hentai tho.
homie literally the king of NTR lmao

Ok, that was kinda fucked up. The girls are taken over by the aliens, again but this time it's permanent so in a sense, they are all dead.
And MC helps them to get their own bf while cucking those guys.
Bad censorship
Is this the end?
